summary: "The Princess Diaries" is a 2001 Disney comedy about Mia, a shy American teen who learns she's a princess of a European kingdom. With help from her grandmother, Queen Clarisse (Julie Andrews), Mia must decide if she wants to be queen. Anne Hathaway stars as Mia. The movie was based on a book and was a big hit, making Hathaway a star and bringing Andrews back to Disney films after many years. A sequel was made in 2004.
title: The Princess Diaries (film)
